title: Fate/Grand Order Chaldea Scrapbook
description: A collection of shorts by beloved TYPE-MOON artist NAKATANI. The focus of this collection is the Absolute Demonic Front arc of F/GO Babylonia the latest game in the FATE/Grand Order franchise. A prequel of sorts, this arc focuses on the origins of the game's most iconic character - Mash. This is the destined era where humans and gods part ways―this is the start of the final battle.
